O2: ATHENA is worshipped for her wisdom aswell as her warrior skills.

ALEXANDER THE GREAT keeps good food
lines but weak when not on the plains.

GERONIMO uses hit and run tactics but
doesn't like to be caught in the open.

CRAZY IVAN isn't a great leader but
he has a good sense of humor.

CAESAR is a tactical genius but does
not always protect his conquests.

GENGHIS KHAN and SUBOTAI use surprise
and speed to become nearly invincible.
NAPOLEON BONAPARTE makes precise plansbut can underestimate his enemy.

SUN TZU understands every aspect of
war and uses it to his advantage.
Placing strength against weakness is themost important principle in war..SUN TZU
Strategy is based on deception.. SUN TZU

The bow is deadly at a distance but
useless at close quarters.... SUN TZU

At close quarters, an archer is an
unarmed man.... SUN TZU

If you know the enemy and yourself,
victory is assured....SUN TZU
It is only by studying the evils of war that we can learn to avoid them..SUN TZU

Don't worry about your beard if your
head is about to be taken.... SUN TZU

Be ready to adapt to changing
situations.... SUN TZU

Make yourself strong and wait for the
enemy's moment of weakness...SUN TZU

Defend when you are weak, attack
when you are strong....SUN TZU

Appear strong when you are weak and
weak when you are strong.... SUN TZU

To become invincible depends on you, the
enemy's fate is his own.... SUN TZU

Protect your weaknesses and take
advantage of your strengths..... SUN TZU

Move only if it is to your
advantage..... SUN TZU

Match strength against weakness and
you will become irresistible... SUN TZU

Never fight when angry or just
to please your ego..... SUN TZU

Lure the enemy with bait or take what
he values.... SUN TZU

Use each soldier according to his
capabilities..... SUN TZU

Energy bends the bow, timing 
releases the arrow.... SUN TZU

A soldier will obey promptly when
in danger..... SUN TZU

Be as coy as a hare and as swift as
the fox and you are invincible...SUN TZU

Be cunning and full of
caution..... SUN TZU

If the enemy is resting, force him
to move..... SUN TZU

The ultimate tactical weapon
is surprise...... SUN TZU

To strengthen a point, another must
be weakened..... SUN TZU
A swift victory is your goal.... SUN TZU

To anticipate the enemy's strategy,
his methods must be studied.... SUN TZU
Like water follows the ground, strategy follows the opponent ... SUN TZU

Victory is found in relation to the
foe you are facing..... SUN TZU
Recklessness leads to death..... SUN TZU

Cowardice leads to capture....
 SUN TZU
A hot temper leads to ridicule.... SUN TZU
The enemy will be tired and you will be rested if you lure him to you... SUN TZU

He who takes his opponent lightly
will fall.... SUN TZU

Always try to meet an inferior force
with a superior force..... SUN TZU

An army will march only as fast as its
slowest unit....SUN TZU

Keep on the move and make shrewd
plans..... SUN TZU

Don't allow his forces to
unite.... SUN TZU

Match strength against weakness and
you will become irresistible... SUN TZU
